Start Turning Payments into Profits<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I would like 30 minutes to introduce you to the easiest new revenue opportunity that you could start collecting this quarter. WEX Virtual provides your Accounts Payable department with a new payment option that replaces checks. It’s a no-cost, ACH-like solution that delivers money to your bottom line. Even better—it integrates directly into your existing ERP system.
Key Benefits: - Maximize financial incentives—think cash back—while paying your bills electronically - Improve working capital—pay your vendors faster and pay us later - Reduce cycle time and costs associated with paper checks - Improve your team’s efficiency with automated reconciliations
WEX is the only commercially chartered bank fully dedicated to addressing your business to business payment needs. As such, you can expect continued investment in solutions, consultations and services to meet your needs. Don’t let this revenue opportunity pass you by. I will follow up with a phone call to see about scheduling an initial discovery session. In the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact me with questions.
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Cell - {!User.MobilePhone} {!User.Email}
Learn more!
